name: Major Contract
description:
Major Contract is a challenging 2D side-scroller where you must collect resources from a series of planets in order to complete your mining Contract.

Key Features

  • Challenging game-play (it's hard)
  • 2D action floater
  • Active combat system
  • Various planets with different environments
  • Upgradable equipment
  • Character customization: Hundreds of possible gear/color combinations

The main focus of the game is to complete your Contract, but it will not be a simple task. Gravity is low, so you must learn to control your boost pack properly and evade the obstacles. Your air is limited, and each planet is full of dangers, but you have a job to do. You can always upgrade your equipment, and improve your odds of survival... for a price.

Languages: English, Español.

The game currently supports XBox 360 controllers natively for gameplay, not for menus. We will be adding full controller support soon.

Major Contract is available for several platforms. For more info, visit our website: http://major.dogfiregames.com
